document_data.name: ''The Ballad of Three Heroes''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Ballad of Three Heroes''''' was a song that, when performed by [[bard]]s, was imbued with beneficial magics.
document_data.Content: When performed by a bard, the song's magic guided the weapons of the singer's allies towards their goal. The swords cut deeper, and maces hit harder. Additionally, those who were inspired by the ballad received the boon of improved defenses and reactions.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, ''The Ballad of Three Heroes'' was very common among bards of middling skills. It was heard being performed in the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] and the village of [[Kuldahar]].
